meanings.definition: To clean with a vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent1: I need to hoover the carpet before the guests arrive.
meanings.sent2: She likes to hoover the house every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally hoovered up my sock along with the dust.
meanings.sent4: The vacuum cleaner hoovered up all the crumbs in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the hoover filled the room as it sucked up the dirt.

meanings.sent1: My mom bought a new Hoover for the living room.
meanings.sent2: The Hoover is very efficient at cleaning up pet hair.
meanings.sent3: I tripped over the Hoover cord while trying to vacuum.
meanings.sent4: The old Hoover still works perfectly after all these years.
meanings.sent5: The Hoover's suction power is impressive for its size.
